TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Series extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPointCustomProperties

summary.span: 存储数据点和序列特性。

span.span: Stores data points and series attributes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示数据序列并存储在 类中。A object represents a data series and is stored in the class. 使用类来存储对象 。A stores objects using the class. 它还存储数据序列的特性。It also stores attributes of the data series. 例如，数据序列具有颜色属性、背景图像属性、背景渐变属性等。For example, a data series has a color attribute, background image attribute, background gradient attribute, and so forth. 属于一个序列的对象也有其自己的属性。The objects that belong to a series also have their own attributes. 通常，如果为数据点及其所属的序列设置了相同的属性，则数据点属性优先。Normally, if the same attribute is set for a data point and the series to which it belongs, the data point attribute has precedence. 序列不一定绘制在图表上;它可以存储用于执行计算的数据点值，这些值用于创建另一个序列，然后绘制该序列。A series is not necessarily plotted on a chart; it can store data point values that are used to perform a calculation from which another series is created and then plotted. 例如，绘制的序列 A 可能是将 Series B 和 C 系列数据点相加的结果，但这两个序列都不会进行绘制。For example, Series A, which is plotted, may be the result of adding Series B and Series C data points together, though neither of these series is plotted. 若要绘制 对象， 必须将属性设置为 用于绘制序列的对象的名称。In order to draw a object, the property must be set to the name of the object used to plot the series. 当创建一个序列时，它会自动分配给 名为 "default" 的对象，如果 "默认" 对象不存在，则自动将其分配给图表区域集合中的第一个可用图表区域。When a series is created, it is automatically assigned to the object named "Default", or to the first available chart area in the chart area collection if the "Default" object does not exist. 若要禁用序列的显示，请将其 属性设置为长度为零的字符串。To disable the display of a series, set its property to a zero-length string. 如果绘制此序列，属性将确定用于绘制此序列的图表类型。The property determines the type of chart that will be used to plot this series, if it is drawn.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

param.name: name
param.span: 将创建的 对象的名称。

span.span: The name of the object that will be created.

param.span: 该名称必须为唯一名称，否则将引发异常。

span.span: This must be a unique name, otherwise an exception will be thrown.

summary.span: 使用指定的系列名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified series name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数可用于创建类的新实例 。This constructor can be used to create a new instance of the class. > [!NOTE] > 此序列仅能存储 具有一个 Y 值的对象。This series is only capable of storing objects that have one Y-value. 如果将具有多个 Y 值的数据点添加到此序列，则会引发异常。If a data point that has multiple Y-values is added to this series, an exception will be thrown. 若要在运行时创建一个序列，请使用 方法。To create a series at run time, use the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string name, int32 yValues) cil managed
Public Sub New (name As String, yValues As Integer)

param.name: name
param.span: 将创建的 对象的名称。

span.span: The name of the object that will be created.

param.name: yValues
param.span: 属于此系列的 对象最多可拥有的 Y 值数。

span.span: The maximum number of Y-values allowed for the objects that belong to this series.

summary.span: 使用指定的名称和最大数目的 Y 值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified name and maximum number of Y values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此序列将只能存储 比参数设置的最大值更多的对象 `yValues` 。This series will only be able to store objects that do not have more Y-values than the maximum set by the `yValues` parameter. 如果添加的数据点的 Y 值超过设置的最大值，则会引发异常。If you add a data point that has more Y-values than the set maximum, an exception will be thrown. 若要 在运行时创建对象， `Add` `Insert` 还可以使用序列集合属性的和方法。To create a object at run time, the `Add` and `Insert` methods of the Series collection property can also be used.

summary.span: 获取或设置标记为空的点的绘制样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the drawing style of points marked as empty.

value.span: 对象。

span.span: A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定标记为空的点的绘制样式，例如，边框颜色、标记图像、背景色或图像等。The property determines the drawing style of points marked as empty, for example, in the border color, in the marker images, background color or images, and so forth. 某些属性仅适用于特定的图表类型。Certain properties are only applicable for specific chart types. 例如，属性不适 用于折线图，但也适用于面积图。For example, the property does not apply to line charts, but does apply to an area chart. 若要显示指示空点的图像，请使用 和 属性，而不是 属性。To display an image that indicates an empty point, use the and properties, and not the property. 属性确定空点的轴标签。The property determines the axis label for empty points. 请注意，对于堆积图类型，轴标签由 设置了此属性的第一个绘制序列的属性确定。Note that for stacked chart types, the axis label is determined by the property of the first plotted series that has this property set. 通过将属性设置为，可以将数据点手动标记为空 `true` 。Data points can be manually marked as an empty by setting the property to `true`. 或者， `InsertEmptyPoints` 可以使用类中的方法之一 来检查缺失数据，并在数据点丢失时插入空点。Alternatively, one of the `InsertEmptyPoints` methods in the class can be used to check for missing data and insert empty points if a data point is missing. > [!NOTE] > 对于线条类型图表，连接到空点的线条的线条颜色由 属性设置确定。In the case of line-type charts, the line color for lines that connect to an empty point is determined by the property setting.

member this.IsXValueIndexed : bool with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，指示数据点索引是否用于 X 值。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether data point indices will be used for the X-values.

value.span: 如果属于此序列的数据点索引用于 X 值，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the indices of data points that belong to the series will be used for X-values; if they will not.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 序列中的所有数据点都使用连续索引，如果此属性为， `true` 则数据点将按顺序绘制，而不考虑它们的关联 X 值。All data points in a series use sequential indices, and if this property is `true` then data points will be plotted sequentially, regardless of their associated X-values. 这意味着不会有 "缺失" 数据点。This means that there will be no "missing" data points. 例如，假设序列中有三个 (3) 数据点，其中 X 值为1、2和4。For example, assume there are three (3) data points in a series having X-values of 1, 2 and 4. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则在 X 轴位置标记为 "3" 的数据点将丢失。If this property was `false`, there would be a data point missing at the X-axis location labeled "3". 但是，如果将此属性设置为 `true` ，则将按顺序在点1、2和4处绘制三个数据点，并且不会丢失数据点。However, if you set this property to `true`, the three data points will be plotted at points 1, 2, and 4, sequentially, and there will be no missing data point. 标记为 "3" 的 X 轴位置不会显示在图表上。The X-axis location labeled "3" will not appear on the chart. 如果你不希望在没有数据的时间间隔内获得数据点（例如周末），这会很有用。This is useful when you do not want to have missing data points for intervals that you know you will not have data for, such as weekends. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果要显示多个序列，并且至少有一个序列使用索引的 X 值，则所有序列都必须对齐，即具有相同数量的数据点，并且相应的点必须具有相同的 X 值。If you are displaying multiple series and at least one series uses indexed X-values, then all series must be aligned - that is, have the same number of data points - and the corresponding points must have the same X-values.

summary.span: 获取或设置与 对象关联的系列的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the series associated with the object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示 对象的名称。

span.span: A value that represents the name of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在设计时和运行时添加序列时，会自动将其分配给默认 对象。When a series is added at both design time and run time, it is automatically assigned to the default object. 如果不想在图例中显示序列，请将此属性设置为零长度字符串，或将 属性设置为 `false` 。If you do not want the series shown in a legend, set this property to a zero-length string, or set the property to `false`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定显示数据点标记的频率。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 一个 值，该值确定显示数据点标记的频率。

span.span: An value that determines how often to display data point markers.

value.span: 默认值为 1（一）。

span.span: The default value is one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定显示标记的频率。The property specifies the frequency with which markers are displayed. 例如，如果将此属性设置为两个 (2) ，则每个其他数据点将使用标记。For example, if you set this property to two (2), every other data point will use a marker. 仅当使用属性启用标记时，才使用此属性 。This property is only used if markers are enabled using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的唯一名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the unique name of a object.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示数据序列的唯一名称。

span.span: A value that represents the unique name of the data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据序列的名称必须唯一;否则，将引发异常。The name of a data series must be unique; otherwise an exception will be thrown. 从对象中检索对象时，此属性可用作索引器 。This property can be used as the indexer when you retrieve a object from the object. 如果将此属性设置为长度为零的字符串，则会引发异常。If this property is set to a zero-length string, an exception will be thrown.

[System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ColorPaletteEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")]

[<System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.ColorPaletteEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置 对象的调色板。

span.span: Gets or sets the color palette of a object.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定了数据系列的调色板。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines the palette for the data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果数据点本身没有分配颜色，并且数据点所属的数据对象也没有分配的颜色，则该调色板用于向数据元素自动分配颜色 。A palette is used to automatically assign colors to data elements if the data points themselves do not have colors assigned to them and if the data object that the data points belong to also does not have an assigned color. 如果未显式指定序列或数据点颜色，则使用的颜色取决于图表类型以及图表控件调色板或系列调色板（如果已指定）。If no series or data point colors are explicitly specified, the colors used depend on the chart type and the Chart control palette or Series palette, if one is specified. 有关更多详细信息，请参阅下表：See the table below for further details: |图表类型Chart Type|已使用序列调色板？Series Palette Used?|数据点显示的颜色Colors Displayed by Data Points| |----------------|--------------------------|-------------------------------------| |任何形状图 (例如，饼图和圆环图) Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|否No|从控件调色板使用的第一个可用颜色 。First available colors used from control palette. 每个数据点一种颜色。One color per data point.| |除形状图外的所有图表All charts except shape charts|否No|控件调色板中的第一个可用颜色 。First available colors from control palette. 每个数据系列一种颜色。One color per data series.| |任何形状图 (例如，饼图和圆环图) Any shape chart (for example, Pie and Doughnut charts)|是Yes|调色板中使用的第一个可用颜色 。First available colors used from palette. 每个数据点一种颜色。One color per data point.| |除形状图外的所有图表All charts except shape charts|是Yes|调色板中使用的第一个可用颜色 。First available colors used from palette. 每个数据系列一种颜色。One color per data series.| 此 属性的优先级高于 根对象的属性 ，这与数据的显示有关。This property has precedence over the property of the root object, with respect to the display of data. 注意：如果 `Palette` 和对象的属性 设置为 "无"，并且没有为相关的数据系列/数据点分配颜色，则使用默认调色板 "BrightPastel" 或 。NOTE: If the `Palette` property for both the and objects is set to None, and no color is assigned to the relevant data series/data points, the default palette "BrightPastel" or is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合属性允许您向序列中添加和删除数据点。The collection property allows you to add and remove data points to a series. 此属性还提供了一些方法和属性，这些方法和属性可用于处理此集合，如查找数据点、执行数据绑定等。This property also provides methods and properties that can be used to manipulate this collection, such as finding data points, performing data-binding, and so forth.

summary.span: 获取或设置序列的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the shadow offset, in pixels, of a series.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示序列的阴影偏移量（以像素为单位）。

span.span: An value that represents the shadow offset of the series, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要实现隐藏，请使用零 (0) 以外的值。To implement shadowing, use a value other than zero (0). 正值将导致阴影向下移动并向右移动。A positive value will result in a shadow that shifts down and to the right. 负值将导致阴影向左移动和向左移动。A negative value will result in a shadow that shifts up and to the left. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置序列的视觉对象特性。The following code example sets the visual attributes of a series. ```vb ' Set series shadow offset Public Sub SetSeriesShadowOffset() Chart1.Series("Default"}.ShadowOffset = 2 End Sub 'SetSeriesVisualAttributes ``` ```csharp // Set series shadow offset public void SetSeriesShadowOffset () { Chart1.Series["Default"].ShadowOffset = 2; } ```

summary.span: 获取或设置序列的 X 轴类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the X-axis type of the series.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列使用主 X 轴还是辅助 X 轴。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines if the series uses the primary or secondary X-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于除水平方向的图表（如条形图和堆积条形图）和形状图（如饼图、圆环图、漏斗图和棱锥图）以外的所有图表类型，主 X 轴始终为下轴，辅助轴为上部轴。For all chart types except horizontally oriented charts such as bar and stacked bar charts, and shape charts such as pie, doughnut, funnel and pyramid charts, the primary X-axis is always the lower axis and the secondary axis is the upper axis. 对于条形图和堆积条形图，主 X 轴为左轴，辅助 X 轴为右轴。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary X-axis is the left axis, and the secondary X-axis is the right axis. 使用辅助 X 轴绘制数据时，必须使用 属性来设置轴属性，而不是 属性。When data is plotted using the secondary X-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性接受成员列的名称或成员列的序号值。This property accepts either the name of the member column or the ordinal value of the member column.

summary.span: 获取或设置沿 X 轴绘制的值类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the value types plotted along the X-axis.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列存储的 X 值数据的类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of X-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定序列存储的数据的类型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 将此属性设置为，以 允许将 X 值作为 值输入，而不是作为 。Set this property to to allow the X-value to be entered as a value, and not as a . 日期和时间值由作为值 .NET Framework 存储 。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values. 这同样适用于对象的 和 属性 。The same holds true for the and properties of objects. `IntervalType`在轴标签、刻度线和网格类中找到的属性决定了间隔类型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. > [!NOTE] > 若要正确地将格式应用于 从数据点 X 值生成的轴标签，请使用 属性，此属性必须设置为 。To correctly apply a format to axis labels that are generated from data point X-values, using the property, this property must be set to . 此属性还可用于确定与 X 值绑定的数据类型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the X-values are bound.

summary.span: 获取或设置序列的 Y 轴类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the Y-axis type of a series.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列使用主 Y 轴还是辅助 Y 轴。

span.span: An enumeration value that determines if a series uses the primary or secondary Y-axis.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是使用主 Y 轴还是辅助 Y 轴绘制序列。The property determines if a series is plotted using the primary or secondary Y-axis. 对于除饼图、圆环图、范围条形图、条形图和堆积条形图之外的所有图表类型，主 Y 轴是左垂直轴，辅助轴是右垂直轴。For all chart types except pie, doughnut, range bar, bar and stacked bar charts, the primary Y-axis is the left vertical axis, and the secondary axis is the right vertical axis. 对于条形图和堆积条形图，主轴是水平轴，辅助 Y 轴是水平轴。For bar and stacked bar charts, the primary axis is the lower horizontal axis, and the secondary Y-axis is the upper horizontal axis. 使用辅助 Y 轴绘制数据时，必须使用 属性来设置轴属性，而不是 属性。When data is plotted using the secondary Y-axis, you must use the property to set axis properties, and not the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置要用于将数据绑定到序列 Y 值的图表数据源的成员列。

span.span: Gets or sets member columns of the chart data source used to bind data to the Y-values of the series.

value.span: 一个 值。

span.span: A value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性接受以逗号分隔的字符串，该字符串包含列的名称或序号值。This property accepts a comma separated string that contains the names or ordinal values of the columns.

summary.span: 获取或设置 中的 对象最多可拥有的 Y 值数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of Y-values that objects in a are allowed to have.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示允许序列中的数据点具有的 Y 值最大数目。

span.span: An value that represents the maximum number of Y-values that the data points in a series are allowed to have.

value.span: 默认值为 1（一）。

span.span: The default value to one (1).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果添加的 对象的 y 值比此属性指定的值多，将忽略多余的 y 值。If you add a object that has more Y-values than this property specifies, the excess Y-values will be ignored. 正确显示图表所需的 Y 值数取决于所选的图表类型。The number of Y-values that are required to properly display a chart depends on the chart type selected.

summary.span: 获取或设置序列所存储的数据点中的 Y 值数据类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of Y-value data in the data points stored by a series.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，决定系列所存储的 Y 值数据类型。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the type of Y-value data stored by the series.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定序列存储的数据的类型。The property determines the type of data stored by the series. 通常将此属性的值设置为 或 。The value of this property is normally set to either or . `IntervalType`在轴标签、刻度线和网格类中找到的属性决定了间隔类型。The `IntervalType` property found in axis label, tick mark, and grid classes determines the interval type. 此属性还可用于确定与 Y 值绑定的数据类型。This property can also be used to determine the data type to which the Y-values are bound. 可以将日期表达式绘制为数据点的值，但这种情况很少发生。It is possible to plot date expressions as the values of data points, though this is rarely done. 如果将此属性设置为 ，则 Y 值随后可以作为 值（而不是）输入 。If you set this property to , the Y-value can then entered as a value, and not as a . 日期和时间值由作为值 .NET Framework 存储 。Date and time values are internally stored by .NET Framework as values.
